Text: Correct Legal Name of Your CompanyI work in the Legal Department for Lisa Herrmann at RWE Trading Americas Inc I am trying to find out the correct legal name of your company that would enter into a natural gas purchasesales contract and a power purchasesale contract Also I am looking for the correct legal name of the company if any that will provide a guaranty I am also trying to find out who within your company handles the contract documentation for the power contracts I would like to get their name phone number fax number and email address Is this something you could help me with Thanks for your help Tammy Gonzales RWE Trading Americas Inc
Fax NumberWhat is you fax number in case we need to fax over anything to you in the future Tammy Gonzales RWE Trading Americas Inc
